::Perndabot::

BrightBlade's question gets Perndabot by surprise, the big bot nodding before 
he realized what the question meant, his eyes widening when he does. He opens 
his mouth to say something, nothing coming out. He closes his mouth, then 
opens it again.

By the time BrightBlade finishes her message to the Predacons, Perndabot 
recovers his composure.

"Let's get going," he says to BrightBlade, his face a bit red as he speeds up 
toward the Cybertronian Fire.
